history.proof: intros z H. destruct H as [k Hk]. apply Zeven_ex_iff. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply Zeven_def1 in Hk as [m Hm].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall z : Z, Zeven z -> exists k : Z, z = 2 * k" on hypothesis of type "z = 2 * k".

original: intros z H. destruct H as [k Hk]. apply Zeven_def1 in Hk as [m Hm]. apply Zeven_ex_iff. exists m. rewrite Hm. rewrite Z.mul_comm with (n:=2) (m:=m). apply Zeven_quot2. auto.
